name: Lost in the supermarket
description: When we were kids, almost all of us went through the terror of getting lost in a supermarket. That moment when your mother wanders off shopping and you're left alone, thinking she's abandoned you. You start desperately looking for her until you find her. This game is that and the opposite, find your mother in a time lapse before she leaves, can you find her with so many people in a supermarket, with the terror of thinking she's gone, with the fear of being kidnapped, getting lost and not being found? Third Person Controller 3D low poly made in Unity.
